alert.note: Alert for Jack; Montague; Wise; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 2:56PM CDT until April 02 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Montague County in north central Texas... East central Young County in north central Texas... Northern Wise County in north central Texas... Jack County in north central Texas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jacksboro, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Decatur, Bridgeport, Bowie, Jacksboro, Alvord, Chico, Bryson, Fort Richardson State Park, Sunset, Lake Amon G Carter, Newport, Runaway Bay, Perrin, Lake Bridgeport, Montague, Cundiff, Lost Creek Reservoir, Park Springs, Crafton and Joplin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
